title: BBC Arabic at 80
itunes:title: BBC Arabic at 80
itunes:subtitle: In the year that BBC Arabic celebrates its 80th anniversary, we speak to the network’s Communication Advisor, Wissam El Sayegh, about the BBC’s history of broadcasting to the Arab world
description:
In the year that BBC Arabic celebrates its 80th anniversary, we speak to the network’s Communication Advisor, Wissam El Sayegh, about the BBC’s history of broadcasting to the Arab world

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
